title: Desktop Picture (com.apple.desktop)
description: The payload that configures the desktop wallpaper.

locked.title: Lock desktop picture
locked.description: If 'true', locks the desktop picture. Replaced with allowWallpaperModification in macOS 10.13.

override-picture-path.title: Desktop picture path
override-picture-path.description: The path to the desktop picture. If set, this picture is always locked.
